      y - is the row coordinate

    • till

      public void till(int x, int y)
      Tils the soil at the given to prepare it for planting
      Parameters:
      x - is the column coordinate
      y - is the row coordinate

    • tick

      public void tick()
      Every Food Item in the field must have its tick() function called to increase the age of each item.If an item in the field has died after ageing, it turns into Untilled. If an Item is Tilled, 20% of the time that location will turn into a new Weed.

    • getWidthX

      public int getWidthX()
      Returns:
      the width of the field

      Returns:

    • harvest

      public int harvest(int x, int y)
      Parameters:
      x - is the column coordinate
      y - is the row coordinate
      Returns:
      The value of the item at the given spot cuts Grain while harvesting, replacing with soil
